00020 #include "rsonardata.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00023 
00024 void RSonarData::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00025 {
00026     r->startReading(getClassName());
00027     minReading = r->read_f32();
00028     maxReading = r->read_f32();
00029     size_t sz = r->read_i32();
00030     devices.resize(sz);
00031     for (size_t i = 0; i < sz; i++) {
00032         devices[i].devicePose.x = r->read_f32();
00033         devices[i].devicePose.y = r->read_f32();
00034         devices[i].devicePose.theta = r->read_f32();
00035         devices[i].reading = r->read_f32();
00036         devices[i].counter = r->read_i32();
00037         devices[i].new_reading = r->read_i8();
00038     }
00039     r->doneReading();
00040 }
00041 
00042 void RSonarData::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00043 {
00044     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00045     w->write_f32(minReading);
00046     w->write_f32(maxReading);
00047     w->write_i32((int) devices.size());
00048     for (size_t i = 0; i < devices.size(); i++) {
00049         w->write_f32(devices[i].devicePose.x);
00050         w->write_f32(devices[i].devicePose.y);
00051         w->write_f32(devices[i].devicePose.theta);
00052         w->write_f32(devices[i].reading);
00053         w->write_i32(devices[i].counter);
00054         w->write_i8(devices[i].new_reading);
00055     }
00056     w->doneWriting();
00057 }
00058 
00059 RDK2_FACTORY(RSonarData);
00060
